Symbol.Script_3D:
if not(WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE) and gs_opening_dir_m=1 then pos_def=1 if not(WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE) and gs_opening_dir_m=2 then pos_def=0 if WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE and gs_opening_dir_m=1 then pos_def=0 if WIDO_REVEAL_SIDE and gs_opening_dir_m=2 then pos_def=1
if pos_def=1 then
!*** default placement
topmat=gs_frame_mat botmat=gs_frame_mat2 sidemat=gs_frame_mat matside=gs_frame_mat2 else
!*** flip
topmat=gs_frame_mat2 botmat=gs_frame_mat sidemat=gs_frame_mat2 matside=gs_frame_mat endif
if gs_frame_mat = gs_frame_mat2 then !*** same materials inside / outside nn=1 framethick=sts mmask=15 else !*** different materials inside / outside nn=2 framethick=sts/2 mmask=14 endif
k = gs_k
material gs_frame_mat
pen gs_frame_pen_cont sect_fill gs_fillFr, gs_penFr_bg, gs_penFr_fg, gs_frame_pen_cont
if type<10 then a0=a-stb_l-stbr else a0=a-stb_l-brs-pfb/2 a01=a-stb_l-stbr endif
unID=50
!if wend=1 then mask1=11 else mask1=13 !if wend=1 then mask2=11 else mask2=15
mask1=13 mask2=15
if type=1 then goto 10 if type=2 then goto 20 if type=3 then goto 30 if type=4 then goto 40 if type=5 then goto 50 if type=6 then goto 60 if type=7 then goto 70 if type=8 then goto 80 if type=9 then goto 90
10:
!****************************************** type 1
!*** no transom
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, a/2, stb3, 10, a/2-stbr, stb2, 15, a/2-stbr, b-stb1, 10, a/2, b, 15, a/2, stb3, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, stb3, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, stb2, 15, a/2-stbr, stb2, 10, a/2, stb3, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, stb3, -1 body 1
if mainfix=0 then
!*** main field is NOT fix
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, -a/2, ph, 10, -a/2+stb_l, ph+stbw, 15, -a/2+stb_l, b-stb1, 10, -a/2, b, 15, -a/2, ph, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 7, sts, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, 0, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, stb2, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, 0, -1
gosub 1000
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 7, sts, -a/2, b, 10, -a/2+stb_l, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, 15, a/2-stbr, b-stb1, 10, a/2, b, 15, -a/2, b, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, -a/2, ph, 10, -a/2+stb_l, ph+stbw, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph, 15, -a/2, ph, -1
gosub 2000
else
!*** main field is fix
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1, b-stb1, 8, -a/2+bf1, ph+stbw, 8, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, ph+stbw, 13, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 6, sts, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, 0, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, stb2, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, ph+stbw, 8, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, 0, -1
gosub 1000
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 7, sts, a/2, b, 10, a/2-stbr, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b, 15, a/2, b, -1
gosub 2000
for ii=1 to nn
gosub 900
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 5, framethick, -a/2, ph, 10, -a/2+stb_l, ph+stbw, mmask, -a/2+stb_l, b-stb1, 10, -a/2, b, mmask, -a/2, ph, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 5, framethick, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1, b-stb1, 8, -a/2+bf1, ph+stbw, 8, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, mmask2, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, -1
gosub 1000
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 5, framethick, -a/2, b, 10, -a/2+stb_l, b-stb1, mmask, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b, mmask, -a/2, b, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 5, framethick, -a/2, ph, 10, -a/2+stb_l, ph+stbw, mmask, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph, mmask, -a/2, ph, -1
gosub 2000
addz framethick
next ii
del nn
endif
gosub 3000
end
20:
!****************************************** type 2
!******* with divided transom ********
if gs_frame_mat<>gs_frame_mat2 then goto 21
!****** same material inside / outside
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 7, sts, -a/2, ph, 10, -a/2+stb_l, ph+stbw, 15, -a/2+stb_l, k, 10, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, 15, -a/2+stb_l, b-stb1, 10, -a/2, b, 15, -a/2, ph, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 7, sts, a/2, stb3, 10, a/2-stbr, stb2, 15, a/2-stbr, k, 10, a/2-stbr, k+stb, 15, a/2-stbr, b-stb1, 10, a/2, b, 15, a/2, stb3, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 11, sts, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, 0, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, stb2, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, 0, -1
gosub 1000
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, stb3, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, stb2, 15, a/2-stbr, stb2, 10, a/2, stb3, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, stb3, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 7, sts, -a/2, b, 10, -a/2+stb_l, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, 15, a/2-stbr, b-stb1, 10, a/2, b, 15, -a/2, b, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, -a/2, ph, 10, -a/2+stb_l, ph+stbw, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph, 15, -a/2, ph, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, -a/2+stb_l, k, 10, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k, 15, -a/2+stb_l, k, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k, 15, a/2-stbr, k, 10, a/2-stbr, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, -1
gosub 2000
goto 22
21:
!****** different materials inside / outside
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 6, sts, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, 0, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, stb2, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, ph+stbw, 8, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, 0, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 7, sts, a/2, stb3, 10, a/2-stbr, stb2, 15, a/2-stbr, k, 10, a/2-stbr, k+stb, 10, a/2, k+stb, 13, a/2, k, 15, a/2, stb3, -1
gosub 1000
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, stb3, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, stb2, 15, a/2-stbr, stb2, 10, a/2, stb3, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, stb3, -1
gosub 2000
if mainfix=0 then
!*** main field is NOT fix
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 6, sts, -a/2, ph, 10, -a/2+stb_l, ph+stbw, 15, -a/2+stb_l, k, 10, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, 8, -a/2, k+stb, 13, -a/2, ph, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 9, sts, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, 0, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, stb2, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k, 13, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, 0, -1
gosub 1000
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, -a/2, ph, 10, -a/2+stb_l, ph+stbw, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph, 15, -a/2, ph, -1
gosub 2000
else
!*** main field is fix
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 7, sts, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1, k+stb, 8, -a/2+bf1, k, 8, -a/2+bf1, ph+stbw, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, ph+stbw, 13, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k, -1
gosub 1000
for ii=1 to nn
gosub 900
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 6, framethick, -a/2, ph, 10, -a/2+stb_l, ph+stbw, mmask, -a/2+stb_l, k, 10, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, 8, -a/2, k+stb, mmask2, -a/2, ph, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 6, framethick, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1, k+stb, 8, -a/2+bf1, ph+stbw, 8, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, mmask, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, -1
gosub 1000
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 5, framethick, -a/2, ph, 10, -a/2+stb_l, ph+stbw, mmask, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph, mmask, -a/2, ph, -1
gosub 2000
addz framethick
next ii
del nn
endif
if top1fix=0 then
!*** top over window is NOT fix
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, 15, -a/2+stb_l, b-stb1, 8, -a/2, b, 15, -a/2, k+stb, 8, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, -1
gosub 1000
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, -a/2, b, 8, -a/2+stb_l, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b, 13, -a/2, b, -1
gosub 2000
else
!*** top over window is fix
for ii=1 to nn
gosub 900
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 5, framethick, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, mmask, -a/2+stb_l, b-stb1, 8, -a/2, b, mmask, -a/2, k+stb, 8, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, -1
gosub 1000
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 5, framethick, -a/2, b, 8, -a/2+stb_l, b-stb1, mmask, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b, mmask2, -a/2, b, -1
gosub 2000
addz framethick
next ii
del nn
endif
if top2fix=0 then
!*** top over door is NOT fix
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, a/2-stbr, k+stb, 15, a/2-stbr, b-stb1, 8, a/2, b, 15, a/2, k+stb, 8, a/2-stbr, k+stb, -1
gosub 1000
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 7, sts, a/2-stbr, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 8, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k, 8, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k, 15, a/2-stbr, k, 10, a/2-stbr, k+stb, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 6, sts, a/2, b, 8, a/2-stbr, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b, 13, a/2, b, -1
gosub 2000
else
!*** top over door is fix
for ii=1 to nn
gosub 900
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 5, framethick, a/2-stbr, k+stb, mmask, a/2-stbr, b-stb1, 8, a/2, b, mmask, a/2, k+stb, 8, a/2-stbr, k+stb, -1
gosub 1000
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 7, framethick, a/2-stbr, k+stb, mmask, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 8, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k, 8, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k, mmask, a/2-stbr, k, 10, a/2-stbr, k+stb, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 6, framethick, a/2, b, 8, a/2-stbr, b-stb1, mmask, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b, mmask2, a/2, b, -1
gosub 2000
addz framethick
next ii
del nn
endif
if top1fix+top2fix=0 then
!*** NO top fix
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, -1 body 1
else
for ii=1 to nn
gosub 900
if top1fix+top2fix=2 then
!*** BOTH top fix
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 5, framethick, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, mmask, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, mmask, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, -1 body 1
else
if top1fix=1 then
!*** only top 1 fix
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 5, framethick, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1, b-stb1, 8, -a/2+bf1, k+stb, 8, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, mmask, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, botmat, 5, framethick, -a/2+bf1, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, mmask, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1, k+stb, 8, -a/2+bf1, b-stb1, -1 body 1
else
!*** only top 2 fix
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 5, framethick, -a/2+bf1, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, mmask, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1, k+stb, 8, -a/2+bf1, b-stb1, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, botmat, 5, framethick, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1, b-stb1, 8, -a/2+bf1, k+stb, 8, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, mmask, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, -1 body 1
endif
endif
addz framethick
next ii
del nn
endif
if top1fix+mainfix=0 then
!*** main + top NOT fix
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, -a/2+stb_l, k, 10, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k, 15, -a/2+stb_l, k, -1 body 1
else
for ii=1 to nn
gosub 900
if top1fix+mainfix=2 then
!*** main + top BOTH fix
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 5, framethick, -a/2+stb_l, k, 10, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, mmask, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k, mmask, -a/2+stb_l, k, -1 body 1
else
if top1fix=1 then
!*** only top 1 fix
cprism_ topmat, botmat, botmat, 5, framethick, -a/2+stb_l, k, 10, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb/2, 8, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb/2, 8, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k, mmask, -a/2+stb_l, k, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 5, framethick, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, 10, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb/2, 8, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb/2, 8, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, mmask, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, -1 body 1
else
!*** only main fix
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 5, framethick, -a/2+stb_l, k, 10, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb/2, 8, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb/2, 8, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k, mmask, -a/2+stb_l, k, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, botmat, 5, framethick, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, 10, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb/2, 8, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb/2, 8, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, mmask, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, -1 body 1
endif
endif
addz framethick
next ii
del nn
endif
22:
gosub 3500
end
30:
!****************************************** type 3
if gs_frame_mat<>gs_frame_mat2 then goto 31
!****** same material inside / outside
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 7, sts, -a/2, ph, 10, -a/2+stb_l, ph+stbw, 15, -a/2+stb_l, k, 10, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, 15, -a/2+stb_l, b-stb1, 10, -a/2, b, 15, -a/2, ph, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 7, sts, a/2, stb3, 10, a/2-stbr, stb2, 15, a/2-stbr, k, 10, a/2-stbr, k+stb, 15, a/2-stbr, b-stb1, 10, a/2, b, 15, a/2, stb3, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 11, sts, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, 0, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, stb2, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, 0, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, -a/2+bf2-stb/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf2+stb/2, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf2+stb/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf2-stb/2, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf2-stb/2, k+stb, -1
gosub 1000
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, stb3, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, stb2, 15, a/2-stbr, stb2, 10, a/2, stb3, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, stb3, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 9, sts, -a/2, b, 10, -a/2+stb_l, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf2-stb/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf2+stb/2, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, 15, a/2-stbr, b-stb1, 10, a/2, b, 15, -a/2, b, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, -a/2, ph, 10, -a/2+stb_l, ph+stbw, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph, 15, -a/2, ph, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 7, sts, -a/2+stb_l, k, 10, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf2-stb/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf2+stb/2, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k, 15, -a/2+stb_l, k, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k, 15, a/2-stbr, k, 10, a/2-stbr, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, -1
gosub 2000
goto 32
31:
!****** different materials inside / outside
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 6, sts, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, 0, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, stb2, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, ph+stbw, 8, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, 0, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 7, sts, a/2, stb3, 10, a/2-stbr, stb2, 15, a/2-stbr, k, 10, a/2-stbr, k+stb, 10, a/2, k+stb, 13, a/2, k, 15, a/2, stb3, -1
gosub 1000
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, stb3, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, stb2, 15, a/2-stbr, stb2, 10, a/2, stb3, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, stb3, -1
gosub 2000
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 6, sts, -a/2, ph, 10, -a/2+stb_l, ph+stbw, 15, -a/2+stb_l, k, 10, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, 8, -a/2, k+stb, 13, -a/2, ph, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 9, sts, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, 0, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, stb2, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k, 13, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, 0, -1
gosub 1000
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, -a/2, ph, 10, -a/2+stb_l, ph+stbw, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph, 15, -a/2, ph, -1
gosub 2000
!*** top over window is always fix here
for ii=1 to nn
gosub 900
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 5, framethick, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, mmask, -a/2+stb_l, b-stb1, 8, -a/2, b, mmask, -a/2, k+stb, 8, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 5, framethick, -a/2+bf2-stb/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf2+stb/2, k+stb, mmask, -a/2+bf2+stb/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf2-stb/2, b-stb1, mmask, -a/2+bf2-stb/2, k+stb, -1
gosub 1000
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 7, framethick, -a/2, b, 8, -a/2+stb_l, b-stb1, mmask, -a/2+bf2-stb/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf2+stb/2, b-stb1, mmask, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b, mmask2, -a/2, b, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 7, framethick, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb/2, 8, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, mmask, -a/2+bf2-stb/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf2+stb/2, k+stb, mmask, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb/2, 8, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb/2, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, framethick, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb/2, 8, -a/2+stb_l, k, mmask, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb/2, 8, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb/2, -1
gosub 2000
addz framethick
next ii
del nn
if top2fix=0 then
!*** top over door is NOT fix
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 5, sts, a/2-stbr, k+stb, 15, a/2-stbr, b-stb1, 8, a/2, b, 15, a/2, k+stb, 8, a/2-stbr, k+stb, -1
gosub 1000
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 7, sts, a/2-stbr, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 8, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k, 8, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k, 15, a/2-stbr, k, 10, a/2-stbr, k+stb, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, matside, 6, sts, a/2, b, 8, a/2-stbr, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b, 13, a/2, b, -1
gosub 2000
else
!*** top over door is fix
for ii=1 to nn
gosub 900
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 5, framethick, a/2-stbr, k+stb, mmask, a/2-stbr, b-stb1, 8, a/2, b, mmask, a/2, k+stb, 8, a/2-stbr, k+stb, -1
gosub 1000
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 7, framethick, a/2-stbr, k+stb, mmask, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 8, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k, 8, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k, mmask, a/2-stbr, k, 10, a/2-stbr, k+stb, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 6, framethick, a/2, b, 8, a/2-stbr, b-stb1, mmask, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b, mmask2, a/2, b, -1
gosub 2000
addz framethick
next ii
del nn
endif
for ii=1 to nn
gosub 900
if top1fix+top2fix=2 then
!*** BOTH top fix
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 5, framethick, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, mmask, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, mmask, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, -1 body 1
else
if top1fix=1 then
!*** only top 1 fix
cprism_ topmat, botmat, sidemat, 5, framethick, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1, b-stb1, 8, -a/2+bf1, k+stb, 8, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, mmask, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, -1 body 1
cprism_ topmat, botmat, botmat, 5, framethick, -a/2+bf1, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, mmask, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1, k+stb, 8, -a/2+bf1, b-stb1, -1 body 1
endif
endif
addz framethick
next ii
del nn
32:
gosub 3500
end
40:
!****************************************** type 4
prism_ 7, sts, -a/2, ph, 10, -a/2+stb_l, ph+stbw, 15, -a/2+stb_l, k, 10, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, 15, -a/2+stb_l, b-stb1, 10, -a/2, b, 15, -a/2, ph, -1 body 1
prism_ 7, sts, a/2, stb3, 10, a/2-stbr, stb2, 15, a/2-stbr, k, 10, a/2-stbr, k+stb, 15, a/2-stbr, b-stb1, 10, a/2, b, 15, a/2, stb3, -1 body 1
prism_ 11, sts, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, 0, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, stb2, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, 0, -1 body 1
prism_ 5, sts, -a/2+bf3-stb/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf3+stb/2, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf3+stb/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf3-stb/2, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf3-stb/2, k+stb, -1
gosub 1000
prism_ 5, sts, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, stb3, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, stb2, 15, a/2-stbr, stb2, 10, a/2, stb3, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, stb3, -1 body 1
prism_ 9, sts, -a/2, b, 10, -a/2+stb_l, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf3-stb/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf3+stb/2, b-stb1, 15, a/2-stbr, b-stb1, 10, a/2, b, 15, -a/2, b, -1 body 1
prism_ 5, sts, -a/2, ph, 10, -a/2+stb_l, ph+stbw, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph, 15, -a/2, ph, -1 body 1
prism_ 5, sts, -a/2+stb_l, k, 10, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k, 15, -a/2+stb_l, k, -1 body 1
prism_ 7, sts, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k, 15, a/2-stbr, k, 10, a/2-stbr, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf3+stb/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf3-stb/2, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, -1
gosub 2000
gosub 3500
end
50:
!****************************************** type 5
prism_ 7, sts, -a/2, ph, 10, -a/2+stb_l, ph+stbw, 15, -a/2+stb_l, k, 10, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, 15, -a/2+stb_l, b-stb1, 10, -a/2, b, 15, -a/2, ph, -1 body 1
prism_ 7, sts, a/2, stb3, 10, a/2-stbr, stb2, 15, a/2-stbr, k, 10, a/2-stbr, k+stb, 15, a/2-stbr, b-stb1, 10, a/2, b, 15, a/2, stb3, -1 body 1
prism_ 11, sts, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, 0, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, stb2, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, 0, -1 body 1
prism_ 5, sts, -a/2+bf2-stb/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf2+stb/2, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf2+stb/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf2-stb/2, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf2-stb/2, k+stb, -1 body 1
prism_ 5, sts, -a/2+bf3-stb/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf3+stb/2, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf3+stb/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf3-stb/2, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf3-stb/2, k+stb, -1
gosub 1000
prism_ 5, sts, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, stb3, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, stb2, 15, a/2-stbr, stb2, 10, a/2, stb3, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, stb3, -1 body 1
prism_ 11, sts, -a/2, b, 10, -a/2+stb_l, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf2-stb/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf2+stb/2, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, b-stb1, 15, -a/2+bf3-stb/2, b-stb1, 10, -a/2+bf3+stb/2, b-stb1, 15, a/2-stbr, b-stb1, 10, a/2, b, 15, -a/2, b, -1 body 1
prism_ 5, sts, -a/2, ph, 10, -a/2+stb_l, ph+stbw, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph+stbw, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, ph, 15, -a/2, ph, -1 body 1
prism_ 7, sts, -a/2+stb_l, k, 10, -a/2+stb_l, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf2-stb/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf2+stb/2, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1-stbm/2, k, 15, -a/2+stb_l, k, -1 body 1
prism_ 7, sts, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k, 15, a/2-stbr, k, 10, a/2-stbr, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf3+stb/2, k+stb, 10, -a/2+bf3-stb/2, k+stb, 15, -a/2+bf1+stbm/2, k+stb, -1
gosub 3500
gosub 2000
end
60:
!****************************************** type 6
end
70:
!****************************************** type 7
80:
!****************************************** type 8
end
90:
!****************************************** type 9
end
!*********************************** subroutins ******************** !*******************************************************************
900:
!*** frame materials
if ii=1 then sidemat=botmat if gs_frame_mat = gs_frame_mat2 then mmask=15 else mmask=11 if gs_frame_mat = gs_frame_mat2 then mmask2=13 else mmask2=9 else sidemat=topmat mmask=14 mmask2=12 endif
return
end
!************** coors for textures *********** !*********************************************
1000:
!*** vertical
rotz 90 vert 0, 0, 0 vert 0.1, 0, 0 vert 0, 0.1, 0 vert 0, 0, 0.1 del 1
coor 2, 1, 2, 3, 4
base
body -1
return
2000:
!*** horizontal
vert 0, 0, 0 vert 0.1, 0, 0 vert 0, 0.1, 0 vert 0, 0, 0.1
coor 2, 1, 2, 3, 4
base
body -1
return
3000:
!******************** side width
!*** base hotspot, side
hotspot -a/2,b/2,0,unID,bf1,1+128 unID=unID+1
!*** moving hotspot, side
hotspot -a/2+bf1,b/2,0,unID,bf1,2 unID=unID+1
!*** reference hotspot, side
hotspot -a,b/2,0,unID,bf1,3 unID=unID+1
return
3500:
!******************** combined edditing of side width / transom height
!*** base hotspot, side
hotspot -a/2,gs_k,0,unID,bf1,1+128 unID=unID+1
!*** moving hotspot, side
hotspot -a/2+bf1,gs_k,0,unID,bf1,2 unID=unID+1
!*** reference hotspot, side
hotspot -a,gs_k,0,unID,bf1,3 unID=unID+1
!*** base hotspot, bottom window height
hotspot -a/2+bf1,stb3,0,unID,gs_k,1+128 unID=unID+1
!*** moving hotspot
hotspot -a/2+bf1,gs_k,0,unID,gs_k,2 unID=unID+1
!*** reference hotspot
hotspot -a/2+bf1,-b,0,unID,gs_k,3 unID=unID+1
return

Boolean.Name: AC_HoleMaterialCurved
Boolean.Description: "Hole Surface's Split is Curved in Curved Walls"
